txt_en: We don't want to tell our dreams. We want to show them.
txt_cn: 我们不想把梦想说出来，而是想展现出来。
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

txt_en: The secret of discipline is motivation. When a man is sufficiently motivated, discipline will take care of itself.
txt_cn: 自律的关键是动机，当一个人的动力足够时，他自然就能自律。
author: Sir Alexander Paterson

txt_en: To fall in love with yourself is the first secret to happiness.
txt_cn: 爱上自己是通往幸福的第一条奥秘。
author: Robert Morley

txt_en: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
txt_cn: 朋友间最美妙的经历，莫过于成长道路不同，却并不因此生出隔阂。
author: Elizabeth Foley

txt_en: To accept ourselves as we are means to value our imperfections as much as our perfections.
txt_cn: 所谓接受自己，意味着既重视自己的完美，也珍视自己的不完美。
author: Sandra Bierig

txt_en: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
txt_cn: 动物的眼睛有一种神奇的力量，诉说着千言万语。
author: Martin Buber

txt_en: Let your joy be in your journey — not in some distant goal.
txt_cn: 让你的喜悦来自旅途中，而非一个遥远的目标。
author: Tim Cook

txt_en: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
txt_cn: 温暖的笑容是放之四海皆准的善意表达。
author: William Arthur Ward

txt_en: Travel and change of place impart new vigor to the mind.
txt_cn: 去新的地方旅行，能让思维焕发新的活力。
author: Seneca

txt_en: Do you want to meet the love of your life? Look in the mirror.
txt_cn: 想见见你的毕生所爱吗？看看镜中吧。
author: Byron Katie

txt_en: A poet is a man who puts up a ladder to a star and climbs it while playing a violin.
txt_cn: 诗人就是对着星空搭起天梯，然后边向上爬边拉小提琴的人。
author: Edmond de Goncourt

txt_en: Until you start believing in yourself, you ain't gonna have a life.
txt_cn: 直到你开始相信自己，你的人生才真正开始。
author: Rocky Balboa

txt_en: Don't tell me the sky's the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
txt_cn: 别对我说天空就是极限，毕竟连月球上都有了人类的脚印。
author: Paul Brandt

txt_en: The best day of your life is the one on which you decide your life is your own.
txt_cn: 你生命中最美好的一天，就是你决定让你的人生属于你自己的那一天。
author: Bob Moawad

txt_en: You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept.
txt_cn: 你可能会忘记和你一同笑过的人，却会永远记得和你一同哭过的人。
author: Kahlil Gibran

txt_en: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
txt_cn: 你想要的一切，都在恐惧的彼端。
author: George Addair
